data.text: Mavofodai ɠa ɠɛ ga zɛbɛsu nu eteai zu.
Toɠa ɓɔɠɔ zɔlɔɔ, naavoloi ɠɛ ná-pɛlɛi wu,
Siɛgi zu fai pɛ suɓidizu la, wozakalagi ɠa ɗa ɠula sɔle nui ʋɛ.
Pagɛ ga nui nuɓɔɠɔlai ɠɛ, é kuyei ʋɛɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ faa nɔpɛ ge la telebo nui ɲiikpiga eyɛsu pɛ,
É la luaa ziiɠoloɠolo kpɔɛ ɲɔiti ba.
Zii la ɓalia, dualua ge la ziimaʋɛ.
Toɠa ɗa faanɛɛi ɠɛ ga bɔɔlɔa maanɔɠɔ nuiti bɛ.
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui a kaana, ziiɠaa ɠa ɗa wana,
